name: F1 TV magnifier
description: This style allows to play the videos on f1tv.formula1.com using the whole window size, without needing to swithc in fullscreen mode. This is useful if you want to split your screen in order to display the timings and the video feed.
additional_info:
changelog:

 * 2021-06-20 fixed right menu display glitches
 * 2021-03-12 initial release
